column4: Is there anything you need to do after using usb creator to make 9.04 persistant???  I left 4.5 gb of extra space.
nope, there's nothing else you need to do.. but keep in mind that the usb boot up disk will no longer work when you change system settings like user accounts
can you put that one in idiot terms..... that is kinda what I am at this point
I have changed any of that stuff
